entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
